name: GCStatus
0:
”Alexa, open GC Status”
”Alexa, ask GC Status for platforms”
”Alexa, ask GC Status for features”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. c. status
des:
Check the current Garmin Connect status as reported on https://connect.garmin.com/status.

Start with "Alexa, open GC Status", or ask for a specific component:
"Alexa, ask GC Status for platforms"
"Alexa, ask GC Status for features"

This skill is an unofficial fan project.

Suggestions for improvement and feedback welcome via https://github.com/sgruendel/alexa-garmin-connect-status/issues/new.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
